definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Edgars says it is beautiful palace - but that “Riga is better”.
sentences.chinese: 埃德加说这是一座美丽的宫殿，但是里加更美丽。
头昏多汗症，粥里加薏仁。
我叫莉莉，是达里加尔的老婆，玛吉的妈。

sentences.english: B. The food tasted bad, however Aunt Kit fixed it.
sentences.chinese: 饭菜不好吃，可姬特姑妈还往里加调味料。

sentences.english: You're supposed to grease the pan first.
sentences.chinese: 你应该先往锅里加点儿油。

sentences.english: Lucy, will you put some salt into the soup?
sentences.chinese: 露西，你能不能往汤里加些盐呀？

sentences.english: For example, adding a small amount of iron to aluminum will make it stronger.
sentences.chinese: 例如，往铝里加少量铁可使其更强。

sentences.english: Some people will add a few drops of eucalyptus oil to their steam shower to give bolster the immune system.
sentences.chinese: 有些人还会在蒸气浴里加几滴桉树油来强化免疫系统。

sentences.english: "Linda, " she said, "will you put some salt into the soup?
sentences.chinese: “琳达，”她说，“你可不可以往汤里加些盐呀？”

sentences.english: Waldow said. Einstein also enjoyed mushrooms with his eggs.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔多说，爱因斯坦还喜欢在鸡蛋里加蘑菇。

sentences.english: She washed her hands and salted the soup herself.
sentences.chinese: 她洗了手，往汤里加了一些盐。

sentences.english: Add the vegetable oil to a large heavy-based frying pan and heat over high heat.
sentences.chinese: 在厚底的大煎锅里加蔬菜油，用大火加热。

sentences.english: I highly suggest adding Tick Tock Timer to your toolbar if possible.
sentences.chinese: 我强烈建议在你的工具栏里加一下定时器。

sentences.english: Lungs and they cough, Porridge Riga lily.
sentences.chinese: 润肺又止咳，粥里加百合。

sentences.english: Add a bay leaf to the soup.
sentences.chinese: 在汤里加一片月桂树的叶子。

definition: to work extra hours/to do overtime
to add less (of a spice etc)
spoon/ladle/CL:把[ba3]/abbr. for 公勺[gong1 shao2], centiliter (unit of volume)
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to let go/to cast/to let loose/to discharge/to give expression to
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
to feed in/to load (raw material, supplies, fuel etc)/to supply/fortified (with added material)
to mix/to mix in/to toss (a salad)
